properties.description:
[Activo comprometido-PS-T1543]
Alerta que identifica la creación de un nuevo proceso en la máquina el cual no se está ejecutando desde la ruta desde la que debería hacerlo.
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where NewProcessName != "" or ProcessName != ""
| where (EventID == 4688 and (Process == "cmd.exe" and NewProcessName !in ("C:\\Windows\\System32\\cmd.exe", "C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\cmd.exe")) or EventID == 4689 and (Process == "cmd.exe" and ProcessName !in ("C:\\Windows\\System32\\cmd.exe", "C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\cmd.exe"))) or (EventID == 4688 and (Process == "csrss.exe" and NewProcessName != "C:\\Windows\\System32\\csrss.exe") or EventID == 4689 and (Process == "csrss.exe" and ProcessName != "C:\\Windows\\System32\\csrss.exe")) or (EventID == 4688 and (Process == "dllhost.exe" and NewProcessName !in ("C:\\Windows\\System32\\dllhost.exe", "C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\dllhost.exe")) or EventID == 4689 and (Process == "dllhost.exe" and ProcessName !in ("C:\\Windows\\System32\\dllhost.exe", "C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\dllhost.exe"))) or (EventID == 4688 and (Process == "explorer.exe" and NewProcessName !in ("C:\\Windows\\explorer.exe", "C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\explorer.exe")) or EventID == 4689 and (Process == "explorer.exe" and ProcessName !in ("C:\\Windows\\explorer.exe", "C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\explorer.exe"))) or (EventID == 4688 and (Process == "lsass.exe" and NewProcessName != "C:\\Windows\\System32\\lsass.exe") or EventID == 4689 and (Process == "lsass.exe" and ProcessName != "C:\\Windows\\System32\\lsass.exe")) or (EventID == 4688 and (Process == "rundll32.exe" and NewProcessName !in ("C:\\Windows\\System32\\rundll32.exe", "C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\rundll32.exe")) or EventID == 4689 and (Process == "rundll32.exe" and ProcessName !in ("C:\\Windows\\System32\\rundll32.exe", "C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\rundll32.exe"))) or (EventID == 4688 and (Process == "services.exe" and NewProcessName != "C:\\Windows\\System32\\services.exe") or EventID == 4689 and (Process == "services.exe" and ProcessName != "C:\\Windows\\System32\\services.exe")) or (EventID == 4688 and (Process == "spoolsv.exe" and NewProcessName != "C:\\Windows\\System32\\spoolsv.exe") or EventID == 4689 and (Process == "spoolsv.exe" and ProcessName != "C:\\Windows\\System32\\spoolsv.exe")) or (EventID == 4688 and (Process == "svchost.exe" and NewProcessName !in ("C:\\Windows\\System32\\svchost.exe", "C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\svchost.exe")) or EventID == 4689 and (Process == "svchost.exe" and ProcessName !in ("C:\\Windows\\System32\\svchost.exe", "C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\svchost.exe"))) or (EventID == 4688 and (Process == "wininit.exe" and NewProcessName != "C:\\Windows\\System32\\wininit.exe") or EventID == 4689 and (Process == "wininit.exe" and ProcessName != "C:\\Windows\\System32\\wininit.exe")) or (EventID == 4688 and (Process == "winlogon.exe" and NewProcessName != "C:\\Windows\\System32\\winlogon.exe") or EventID == 4689 and (Process == "winlogon.exe" and ProcessName != "C:\\Windows\\System32\\winlogon.exe"))
